DOC.brief_summary: This trial evaluates whether long-term treatment with Genotropin normalizes final (adult) height in short children born small for gestational age
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Of Short Stature With Genotropin In Children Born Small For Gestational Age Until Final Height
DOC.criteria: Participation in the 90080 study Any severe, acute or chronic disease Any other identifiable reason for short stature
